attributes.description:
Ghirardelli is an american chocolate confectioner, one the few companies in America that controls their manufacturing process from cocoa bean to their finished product. There for, most of their materials and process of manufacturing happens in San Fransisco, California. 

Ghirardelli was first acquired by Quaker Oats, who later selling the Ghirardelli Chocolate division to a private investment group. Swiss confectioner, Lindt and Sprungli then acquired Ghirardelli Chocolate Company, who opened its first factory store at the site of the headquarters and manufactory in San Leandro, California.

Recently built an ice cream parlor including drinks and their chocolates. [15]

Their strategy to expand in the quickest and cheapest way is to identify a busy tourist area and sign a short lease. If the store doesn't reach a certain number of sales, the company will close down the store, and build their chocolate and ice cream shops in a different tourist place.
